page.title: 05Liverpool Newsham,Home Life
page.content: MONDAY 1st JULY 1985 Monday morning I got up very early. I had chocolate Ready Break for my breakfast. I got dressed and went to school and played for a bit. The school whistle went and we lined up. We were the first to go in. We went upstairs, took our coats off and went to our classrooms to work. We went down to the hall for hymns. We went back to the classroom and got on with our diary. We played out and I played with Jane with two balls. We came in then for baths and Mrs. Murphy said that the water was cold so we swam round three times and got out. It was dinner time and I went home and I had chicken soup. I returned to school and got on with my work. Then it was home time and I watched Childrens ITV, I played out, came in,watched Coronation St. and Brookside. Then I went to bed.
